aarakshitha parani smaraka prakashayata path kirima. 1940 anka 09 darana purawasthu aagnya panathe karya sandaha 16, 17, 18, 19 waganthi prakarawa wishaya bhara amathyawaraya wisin rajaye gasat pathrayakin purawidya smaraka path kirima sidukaranu labayi. 1998 anka 24 darana purawasthu (sanshodhana) panathe nithi prathipadanayanta anukulawa wasara 100 ikma wu aithihasika, purawidyathmaka watinakamakin yuth pauranika idikirim purawidya smaraka lesa prakashayata pathkirima sidu karanu labayi. 1940 anka 09 darana purawasthu aagnya panathe 16 wana ha 17 wana waganthi yatathe rajaya sathu idamwala pawathina pauranika idakirim da rajaye ho wenayam idamaka wadena pauranika wruksha, eewaye surakshithathawa ha aarakshawa salasima pinisa parani smaraka washayenprakashayata path kirima sidukaranu labayi.

umbaath eekita trayida?duhul :- mama trayi naha.ee wunata ape diga trayi.umbaa dannawane diga trayi karana kellata umbaa trayi karanna giyoth wenne mokadda kiyala?ee hinda umbaa wade athaarala dapan.diga thamayi me paniwide kiyanna kiwwe.eelaga para umbaath ekka me gana mehema hodin katha karanne na kiyalath kiyanna kiwwa.dan duhula patta pora toks tikak digena digena yanawa.nyawwage munath kalu wela.purupuru ithin pusgamata aawe 7 wasare agadine.ithin mans diga ganawath, wena marayo ganawath danne na.(eka marayekwa witharak danagena hitiya.ee gana passe kiyannanko) ee wunata ape sikata wage me wage awasthawaladi flawar jamp wena gathiyak purupuruta thibuna.ithin dan mansta ambanata flawar jamp wela.purupuru :- machan duhul, umbae yaluwath nyawwa wagema kalu kumarita thama trayi witharayine.thawama eekiwa dagena nane.ithin uuta ayithiyak na nyawwata me widihata paniwida ewanna.onna miniha kalu kumariwa dagena iwarayinan kamak na.mun dennama kalu kumarita trayi karapuden.kalu kumari thaman kamathi kolla ekka yalu weyine.duhul :- me purupuru, apita ugannanna umbaa kawuda?umbaa waradi minissuth ekka happenna hadanne.api gampaha balaka widyale kollo.me gampaha disthrikke apith ekka gemata kawuruth naha.umbaalata paw kiyala mehema kalin wonin ekak dunne.eeth eeka piliganna barinan api dannawa umbaalata katha karanna oone widiha.ee paranan purupuruta panne ankontrolabal malak.duhul kiyanne echchara loku agak thibuna dayal ekak neweyi.ee wunata purupuru kiyanne ee dawaswala thamange wayase anith lamayinta sapekshawa loku agak thibuna lamayek.ithin duhulge toks walata kenthi giya purupuru mansge shart eke kolar eken allala thappekata heththu karala mehema tokak dunnalupurupuru :- ado me, umbae mahaloku digata kiyapan api uu kiyana dewal ahanne na kiyala.me wade nyawwa nawaththanne kalu kumari kiwwoth witharayi.mehema kiyapu purupuru duhulwa athaariya.duhuluth baya wechcha para wachanayakwath kiyanne nathuwa yanna giya.anith kattiyage adahasa wunenan gampaha balaka widyaleth ekka happenna gihilla purupuru karagaththe maha naspaththiyak kiyala.kohoma kohoma ee sathiye ape puso tika ara nyawwa hina dakapu samaja adhyayanaya panthiyatath giya.panthi iwara wune mathaka widihata hawasa pahamarata.ithin eda upasakath panthi aawe na.dan purupuruyi, nyawwayi, malu kattayi pusgama tawun eka paththata yanawalu.me athare aapu dewagama bas ekakata godawechcha malukattath gedara giyalu.ithuru wune purupuruyi nyawwayi witharayi.dan ape puso denna pusgama bastand ekatama gihin.eka paratama wisipahaka thihaka withara set ekak puso inna paththata aawalu.me dawas weddi ara wechcha kathabaha nisa koyi welawe hari gampaha balaka widyalen atak ekak eyi kiyala thamayi ape puso balaporoththuwen hitiye.eeth eeka mechchara ikmanata sidda weyi kiyala kawuruth hithuwe na.ithin ara aapu set eka ape purupuruwayi, nyawwawayi wata karagaththalu.hithapu widihatama awilla hitiye pusgama hitapu gampaha balaka widyale kollo set eka.eeth duhul penna hitiye na.set eke mulikathwaya gaththa kolla godak usa kenek hinda ee hitiye diga kiyala hithaganna purupuruta amaru wune nalu."kawuda yako purupuru kiyanne??"
